timeline.bodyText:
why remove the iputType?
textEmailAddress triggers the email keyboard, which is a pretty useful feature
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -105,12 +105,12 @@
                     style="@style/profileTextField"
                     android:text="@string/username" />
 
-                <android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatEditText
+                <TextView
                     android:id="@+id/edittxt_email"
                     style="@style/signUpEditText"
                     android:enabled="false"
                     android:hint="@string/enter_email"
-                    android:inputType="textEmailAddress"

replies.bodyText: This is been changed to textview as it's used only for display purpose, inputType is only for edittext
replies.author: naveenr-btc
